programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yang's action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles Larry Yang - Director Jackie Chan - Master Luo Zhilong Liu Haocun - Xiao Bao Kevin Guo - Lu Naihua Wu Jing - Chen Yuanwei Joey Yung - Ying Zi.

programme.title: The Secret Kingdom
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Peter and his younger sister Verity move into a new house and struggle to acclimatise to their surroundings in an emotionally unsettling period for their family. The children tumble into a cavernous space beneath their bedroom and are greeted by an army of pangolins, who decree Peter their ruler. programme.title: A Sacrifice
programme.desc: US social psychologist Ben Monroe investigates a local cult connected to an unnerving event, while his daughter becomes mixed up with an enigmatic local boy. programme.title: Arcadian
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action horror starring Nicolas Cage. Following an apocalyptic event, single father Paul lives with his two teenage sons on an isolated homestead, forced to hide every night from the nocturnal monsters that stalk the outdoors. Though the trio has settled into a relatively stable routine, their lives are threatened when the creatures start working out how to get inside.. programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, Comedy ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Comedy drama, based on the true story of conman Frank Abagnale Jr, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hanks.
